metadata.Title: CVE-2016-1000338 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description: In Bouncy Castle JCE Provider version 1.55 and earlier the DSA does not fully validate ASN.1 encoding of signature on verification. It is possible to inject extra elements in the sequence making up the signature and still have it validate, which in some cases may allow the introduction of 'invisible' data into a signed structure.

criterions.comment: bouncycastle: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
